name: Executable Used by PlugX in Uncommon Location
description: Detects the execution of an executable that is typically used by PlugX for DLL side loading started from an uncommon location
query: ((((((((((((process.executable:/.*\\[Cc][Aa][Mm][Mm][Uu][Tt][Ee]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND (NOT (process.executable:(/.*\\[Ll][Ee][Nn][Oo][Vv][Oo]\\[Cc][Oo][Mm][Mm][Uu][Nn][Ii][Cc][Aa][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn]\ [Uu][Tt][Ii][Ll][Ii][Tt][Yy]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Ll][Ee][Nn][Oo][Vv][Oo]\\[Cc][Oo][Mm][Mm][Uu][Nn][Ii][Cc][Aa][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn][Ss]\ [Uu][Tt][Ii][Ll][Ii][Tt][Yy]\\.*/)))) OR (process.executable:/.*\\[Cc][Hh][Rr][Oo][Mm][Ee]_[Ff][Rr][Aa][Mm][Ee]_[Hh][Ee][Ll][Pp][Ee][Rr]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND (NOT (process.executable:/.*\\[Gg][Oo][Oo][Gg][Ll][Ee]\\[Cc][Hh][Rr][Oo][Mm][Ee]\\[Aa][Pp][Pp][Ll][Ii][Cc][Aa][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn]\\.*/)))) OR (process.executable:/.*\\[Dd][Vv][Cc][Ee][Mm][Uu][Mm][Aa][Nn][Aa][Gg][Ee][Rr]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND (NOT (process.executable:/.*\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\ [Dd][Ee][Vv][Ii][Cc][Ee]\ [Ee][Mm][Uu][Ll][Aa][Tt][Oo][Rr]\\.*/)))) OR (process.executable:/.*\\[Gg][Aa][Dd][Gg][Ee][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND (NOT (process.executable:/.*\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\ [Mm][Ee][Dd][Ii][Aa]\ [Pp][Ll][Aa][Yy][Ee][Rr]\\.*/)))) OR (process.executable:/.*\\[Hh][Cc][Cc]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND (NOT (process.executable:/.*\\[Hh][Tt][Mm][Ll]\ [Hh][Ee][Ll][Pp]\ [Ww][Oo][Rr][Kk][Ss][Hh][Oo][Pp]\\.*/)))) OR (process.executable:/.*\\[Hh][Kk][Cc][Mm][Dd]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND (NOT (process.executable:(/.*\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]32\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Nn][Aa][Tt][Ii][Vv][Ee]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Ww][Oo][Ww]64\\.*/))))) OR (process.executable:/.*\\[Mm][Cc]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND (NOT (process.executable:(/.*\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\ [Vv][Ii][Ss][Uu][Aa][Ll]\ [Ss][Tt][Uu][Dd][Ii][Oo].*/ OR /.*\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\ [Ss][Dd][Kk].*/ OR /.*\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\ [Kk][Ii][Tt].*/))))) OR (process.executable:/.*\\[Mm][Ss][Mm][Pp][Ee][Nn][Gg]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND (NOT (process.executable:(/.*\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\ [Ss][Ee][Cc][Uu][Rr][Ii][Tt][Yy]\ [Cc][Ll][Ii][Ee][Nn][Tt]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\ [Dd][Ee][Ff][Ee][Nn][Dd][Ee][Rr]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Aa][Nn][Tt][Ii][Mm][Aa][Ll][Ww][Aa][Rr][Ee]\\.*/))))) OR (process.executable:/.*\\[Mm][Ss][Ss][Ee][Cc][Ee][Ss]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND (NOT (process.executable:(/.*\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\ [Ss][Ee][Cc][Uu][Rr][Ii][Tt][Yy]\ [Cc][Ee][Nn][Tt][Ee][Rr]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\ [Ss][Ee][Cc][Uu][Rr][Ii][Tt][Yy]\ [Cc][Ll][Ii][Ee][Nn][Tt]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\ [Ss][Ee][Cc][Uu][Rr][Ii][Tt][Yy]\ [Ee][Ss][Ss][Ee][Nn][Tt][Ii][Aa][Ll][Ss]\\.*/))))) OR (process.executable:/.*\\[Oo][Ii][Nn][Ff][Oo][Pp]11\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND (NOT (process.executable:/.*\\[Cc][Oo][Mm][Mm][Oo][Nn]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\ [Ss][Hh][Aa][Rr][Ee][Dd]\\.*/)))) OR (process.executable:/.*\\[Oo][Ll][Ee][Vv][Ii][Ee][Ww]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND (NOT (process.executable:(/.*\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\ [Vv][Ii][Ss][Uu][Aa][Ll]\ [Ss][Tt][Uu][Dd][Ii][Oo].*/ OR /.*\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\ [Ss][Dd][Kk].*/ OR /.*\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\ [Kk][Ii][Tt].*/ OR /.*\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\ [Rr][Ee][Ss][Oo][Uu][Rr][Cc][Ee]\ [Kk][Ii][Tt]\\.*/))))) OR (process.executable:/.*\\[Rr][Cc]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND (NOT (process.executable:(/.*\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\ [Vv][Ii][Ss][Uu][Aa][Ll]\ [Ss][Tt][Uu][Dd][Ii][Oo].*/ OR /.*\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\ [Ss][Dd][Kk].*/ OR /.*\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\ [Kk][Ii][Tt].*/ OR /.*\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\ [Rr][Ee][Ss][Oo][Uu][Rr][Cc][Ee]\ [Kk][Ii][Tt]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\.[Nn][Ee][Tt]\\.*/)))))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((((((((((((process.executable:*\\CamMute.exe AND (NOT (process.executable:(*\\Lenovo\\Communication\ Utility\\* OR *\\Lenovo\\Communications\ Utility\\*)))) OR (process.executable:*\\chrome_frame_helper.exe AND (NOT (process.executable:*\\Google\\Chrome\\application\\*)))) OR (process.executable:*\\dvcemumanager.exe AND (NOT (process.executable:*\\Microsoft\ Device\ Emulator\\*)))) OR (process.executable:*\\Gadget.exe AND (NOT (process.executable:*\\Windows\ Media\ Player\\*)))) OR (process.executable:*\\hcc.exe AND (NOT (process.executable:*\\HTML\ Help\ Workshop\\*)))) OR (process.executable:*\\hkcmd.exe AND (NOT (process.executable:(*\\System32\\* OR *\\SysNative\\* OR *\\SysWow64\\*))))) OR (process.executable:*\\Mc.exe AND (NOT (process.executable:(*\\Microsoft\ Visual\ Studio* OR *\\Microsoft\ SDK* OR *\\Windows\ Kit*))))) OR (process.executable:*\\MsMpEng.exe AND (NOT (process.executable:(*\\Microsoft\ Security\ Client\\* OR *\\Windows\ Defender\\* OR *\\AntiMalware\\*))))) OR (process.executable:*\\msseces.exe AND (NOT (process.executable:(*\\Microsoft\ Security\ Center\\* OR *\\Microsoft\ Security\ Client\\* OR *\\Microsoft\ Security\ Essentials\\*))))) OR (process.executable:*\\OInfoP11.exe AND (NOT (process.executable:*\\Common\ Files\\Microsoft\ Shared\\*)))) OR (process.executable:*\\OleView.exe AND (NOT (process.executable:(*\\Microsoft\ Visual\ Studio* OR *\\Microsoft\ SDK* OR *\\Windows\ Kit* OR *\\Windows\ Resource\ Kit\\*))))) OR (process.executable:*\\rc.exe AND (NOT (process.executable:(*\\Microsoft\ Visual\ Studio* OR *\\Microsoft\ SDK* OR *\\Windows\ Kit* OR *\\Windows\ Resource\ Kit\\* OR *\\Microsoft.NET\\*)))))`
